item.title: View Cluster Role List
item.description:
This section explains how to view the cluster role list.

Prerequisites

You should join a cluster and have the Role Viewing permission within the cluster. For more information, refer to "Cluster Members" and "Cluster Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Role Viewing permission, and access your cluster.

  2. Click Cluster Settings > Cluster Roles in the left navigation pane.

item.title: View Cluster Role Details
item.description:
This section explains how to view cluster role details.

Prerequisites

You should join a cluster and have the Role Viewing permission within the cluster. For more information, refer to "Cluster Members" and "Cluster Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Role Viewing permission, and access your cluster.

  2. Click Cluster Settings > Cluster Roles in the left navigation pane.

  3. Click the name of a cluster role in the list to open its details page.

  4. On the Permissions tab on the right side of the details page, you can view the permissions associated with the cluster role.
